title: Any hope for aspect oriented programming?
body:
by **dukeofgaming**: 
Perhaps a wild proposal, but, native language support for this already 
proven to work but not widely supported technique would be awesome for a 
language like this that focuses on code & time saving.

For those unfamiliar with AOP (I'd describe it as reflection on steroids on 
language-level events), here are some useful references:

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aspect-oriented_programming
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c-492qXrT6w <-best one to start with
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cq7wpLI0hco <-more understandable with the 
previous video
